name: searchbook
description: Lightweight local CRM for executive job search networking

scripts.start: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.build:vercel: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client && cd server && DATABASE_URL=file:./dev.db npx prisma generate
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix client && npm run typecheck --prefix server
scripts.prepush: npm run typecheck && echo 'âœ“ TypeScript check passed'
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
